element.name: gmi:MI_Metadata
element.label: Metadata (EURAC)
element.description: root entity which defines metadata about a resource or resources

element.name: gmi:MIE_Georectified
element.label: Grid Information
element.description: Spatial representation information about the grid

element.name: gmi:orientationParameterDescription
element.label: Orientation
element.description: Orientation used in creating the image

element.name: gmi:mie_resamplingOption
element.label: Resampling Option
element.description: Resampling option used in creating the image.

element.name: gmi:mie_scanGapInterpolation
element.label: Scan Gap Interpolation
element.description: Maximum scan gap width (in units of ETM+ 30-m detectors/pixels) filled by interpolation

element.name: gmi:MD_CRS
element.label: Reference System
element.description: Reference System Information

element.name: gmi:projection
element.label: Projection
element.description: Information about the cartographic projection

element.name: gmi:ellipsoid
element.label: Ellipsoid
element.description: Information about the reference ellipsoid

element.name: gmi:datum
element.label: Datum
element.description: Information about the datum

element.name: gmi:projectionParameters
element.label: Projection parameters
element.description: Information about the projection parameters

element.name: gmi:zone
element.label: Zone
element.description: Information about the zone

element.name: gmi:MIE_ImageDescription
element.label: Image Description
element.description: Information about the image characteristics.

element.name: gmi:MIE_Band
element.label: Band Information
element.description: Information about the band characteristics.

element.name: gmi:mie_RadianceLMAX
element.label: Radiance LMAX
element.description: The spectral radiance scaled to QCALMAX in watts/(meter squared * ster * μm)

element.name: gmi:mie_RadianceLMIN
element.label: Radiance LMIN
element.description: The spectral radiance scaled to QCALMIN in watts/(meter squared * ster * μm)

element.name: gmi:mie_ReflectanceMAX
element.label: Reflectance MAX
element.description: The MAX spectral reflectance of the band

element.name: gmi:mie_ReflectanceMIN
element.label: Reflectance MIN
element.description: The MIN spectral reflectance of the band

element.name: gmi:mie_calibratedPixelValueMAX
element.label: Calibrated Pixel Value MAX
element.description: The minimum quantized calibrated pixel value (corresponding to LMAX) in DN

element.name: gmi:mie_calibratedPixelValueMIN
element.label: Calibrated Pixel Value MIN
element.description: The minimum quantized calibrated pixel value (corresponding to LMIN) in DN

element.name: gmi:mie_correctionGainBand
element.label: Correction Gain Band
element.description: Information about correction gain band

element.name: gmi:mie_gainBand
element.label: Gain band
element.description: Band gain state of band detected at the start of a WRS scene

element.name: gmi:mie_gainChangeBand
element.label: Gain change band
element.description: The presence and direction of change in detector gain state within the WRS scene

element.name: gmi:description
element.label: Description
element.description: Description

element.name: gmi:type
element.label: Type
element.description: Type

element.name: gmi:MIE_Platform
element.label: Platform
element.description: Platform

element.name: gmi:mie_orbitType
element.label: Orbit Type
element.description: Status type of image, if newly acquired or produced from a previously archived image

element.name: gmi:mie_dataStatus
element.label: Data Status
element.description: Status type of image, if newly acquired or produced from a previously archived image

element.name: gmi:mie_orbitDirection
element.label: Orbit Direction
element.description: The direction the satellite was traveling in its orbit when the image was acquired

element.name: gmi:mie_incidenceAngle
element.label: Incidence Angle
element.description: The angle between the view direction of the satellite and a line perpendicular to the image or tile center

element.name: gmi:mie_azimuthAngle
element.label: Azimuth Angle
element.description: The angle from true north at the image or tile center to the scan (line) direction at image center, in clockwise positive degrees.

element.name: gmi:mie_spaceCraftViewAngle
element.label: spaceCraftViewAngle
element.description: Spacecraft across-track off-nadir viewing angle used for imaging, in degrees with + being East and - being West

element.name: gmi:mie_sensorScanningSystemType
element.label: Sensor Scanning System Type
element.description: Type of scanning system used by the sensor

element.name: gmi:MIE_Instrument
element.label: Instrument
element.description: Instrument

element.name: gmi:MI_AcquisitionInformation
element.label: Acquisition information description
element.description: Acquisition information description

element.name: gmi:mie_numberOfBands
element.label: Number of bands
element.description: Number of Bands

element.name: gmi:mie_groundSampleDistanceInColumn
element.label: Ground Sample Distance of the columns (pixels) within the image product
element.description: The GSD of the columns (pixels) within the image product

element.name: gmi:mie_groundSampleDistanceInRow
element.label: Ground Sample Distance of the rows (pixels) within the image product
element.description: The GSD of the rows (pixels) within the image product

element.name: gmi:mie_numberOfColumns
element.label: Number of columns (pixels) per line in the image
element.description: Number of columns (pixels) per line in the image

element.name: gmi:mie_numberOfRows
element.label: Number of rows (lines) in the image
element.description: Number of rows (lines) in the image

element.name: gmi:MIE_ImageGeometry
element.label: Image Geometry description
element.description: Image Geometry description

element.name: gmi:mie_imageGeometry
element.label: Image Geometry
element.description: Image Geometry

element.name: gmi:mie_imageSize
element.label: Image Size in pixels
element.description: Image Size

element.name: gmi:mie_versionISD
element.label: Version of Image Support Data
element.description: Version of ISD

element.name: gmi:mie_pixelFormat
element.label: Pixel Format
element.description: Number of bits per pixel in the product image file.

element.name: gmi:mie_tileID
element.label: Tile ID
element.description: Tile ID of the product corresponding to the RE Tile Grid

element.name: gmi:mie_atmosphericCorrectionParameters
element.label: Atmospheric Correction Parameters
element.description: Atmospheric Correction Parameters

element.name: gmi:MIE_AtmosphericCorrectionParameters
element.label: Atmospheric Correction Parameters Information
element.description: Atmospheric Correction Parameters Information

element.name: gmi:mie_atmosphericCorrectionApplied
element.label: Atmospheric Correction Applied
element.description: Atmospheric Correction Applied

element.name: gmi:mie_autoVisibility
element.label: Auto Visibility
element.description: Indicates whether the visibility was automatically calculated or defaulted

element.name: gmi:mie_visibility
element.label: Visibility in km
element.description: The visibility value used for atmospheric correction in km

element.name: gmi:mie_aerosolType
element.label: Aerosol Type
element.description: The aerosol type used for atmospheric correction

element.name: gmi:mie_waterVapor
element.label: The water vapor category
element.description: The water vapor category used

element.name: gmi:mie_hazeRemoval
element.label: Haze Removal
element.description: Indicates whether haze removal was performed

element.name: gmi:mie_roughTerrainCorrection
element.label: Rough terrain correction
element.description: Indicates whether rough terrain correction was performed

element.name: gmi:mie_BRDFcorrection
element.label: BRDF correction
element.description: Indicates whether BRDF correction was performed

element.name: gmi:mie_cloudMask
element.label: Cloud Mask
element.description: Cloud Mask

element.name: gmi:mie_shadowMask
element.label: Shadow Mask
element.description: Shadow Mask

element.name: gmi:mie_licenseInformation
element.label: License Information
element.description: Atmospheric Correction Applied

element.name: gmi:MIE_License
element.label: License
element.description: License

element.name: gmi:mie_orderID
element.label: Order ID of the product
element.description: Order ID of the product

element.name: gmi:mie_licenseType
element.label: Name of selected license for the product
element.description: Name of selected license for the product

element.name: gmi:mie_licenseLink
element.label: Hyperlink to the physical license file
element.description: Hyperlink to the physical license file

element.name: gmi:mie_maskFileName
element.label: File name of the mask file
element.description: Mask File Name

element.name: gmi:mie_maskAvailability
element.label: Mask Availability
element.description: Mask Availability

element.name: gmi:MIE_MaskInformation
element.label: Mask Information Description
element.description: Mask Information Description

element.name: gmi:mie_archivingCenter
element.label: Archiving Center
element.description: Location where image is archived

element.name: gmi:mie_archivingIdentifier
element.label: Archiving Identifier
element.description: Catalog ID of image within the RE DMS processing system

element.name: gmi:mie_archivingDate
element.label: Archiving Date
element.description: Date image was archived

element.name: gmi:mie_maskInfo
element.label: Mask Information
element.description: Mask Information

element.name: gmi:mie_elevationCorrectionApplied
element.label: Type of elevation correction applied to the image
element.description: Type of elevation correction applied to the image

element.name: gmi:mie_geoCorrectionLevel
element.label: Level of correction applied to the image
element.description: Level of correction applied to the image

element.name: gmi:mie_masking
element.label: Masking
element.description: Indicates the sensor applied masking

element.name: gmi:mie_shifting
element.label: Shifting
element.description: Indicates the sensor applied right shifting

element.name: gmi:mie_binning
element.label: Binning
element.description: Indicates the binning used (across track x along track)

element.name: gmi:mie_suspectMissingLines
element.label: Suspect Missing Lines
element.description: Percentage of missing lines in the source data of this band

element.name: gmi:mie_percentMissingLines
element.label: Percent Suspect Lines
element.description: Percentage of suspect lines (lines that contained downlink errors) in the source data for the band

element.name: mie_archivingInformation
element.label: Archiving Information
element.description: Archiving Information

element.name: gmi:mie_platformName
element.label: Platform Name
element.description: Identifies the name of the satellite platform used to collect the image

element.name: gco:Integer
element.label: Integer
element.description: Please input an Integer

element.name: gco:Real
element.label: Real
element.description: Please input a Real

element.name: gco:Boolean
element.label: Yes / No
element.description: Please tick if the answer is yes

element.name: gco:Decimal
element.label: Decimal
element.description: Please input decimal number

element.name: gmd:errorStatistic
element.label: Degree
element.description: This is the degree of conformity of the resource to the implementing rules adopted under Article 7(1) of Directive 2007/2/EC or other specification. The value domain of this metadata element is defined in Part D.

element.name: gmd:DQ_QuantitiativeResult
element.label: Degree
element.description: Please choose one conformant degree
